{"emails": ["success@simulator.amazonses.com", "bounce@simulator.amazonses.com"], "subject": "Weekly Newsletter - January 2024", "html_body": "Newsletter

Welcome to our Newsletter!

This is our weekly update with the latest news and updates.

  • Feature Update: New dashboard
  • Bug Fix: Login improvements
  • Announcement: Upcoming maintenance

Best regards,
The TicketSqueeze Team

"}
